tool_description: Converts monetary amounts between currencies using real-time exchange rates with fee calculations.
error_messages: Invalid currency code: Currency code must be valid ISO 4217 format
Unsupported currency pair: Currency conversion not supported for this pair
Exchange rate unavailable: Current exchange rate not available
Amount out of range: Amount must be greater than zero
usage: Provide the amount and currency codes for conversion. The tool returns converted amount using current exchange rates.
